name: Space Odyssey (itch) (Reacast, Amaimon208)
description:
Space Odyssey is a space shooter about a cat travelling through space in search of missing pieces od the rainbow. Collect them all and save the universe from destruction!

The game is all about managing an ever-changing series of attacks and choosing between a precise, strong attack or unleashing chaotic rainbow power.

Done in 4 days during Hello GameJam 2022. Everything, besides music and font, was made from scratch.
